blogPost.excerpt: Stripe Invoicing is a global invoicing platform built to save you time and get you paid faster. Create and send a Stripe-hosted invoice in minutes—no code required. Or, use the Invoicing API to automate how you collect and reconcile payments.
blogPost.body: Stripe Invoicing is a global invoicing platform built to save you time and get you paid faster. Create and send a Stripe-hosted invoice in minutes—no code required. Or, use the Invoicing API to automate how you collect and reconcile payments.
blogPost.title: Stripe Invoicing - Invoicing built for speed and scale
blogPost.author: Edwin Wee

localize.description: Stripe Invoicingは、時間を節約し、より早く支払いを受けるために構築された、グローバルな請求書発行プラットフォームです。コードは不要で、Stripeがホストする請求書を数分で作成・送信できます。また、Invoicing API を使用して、支払いの収集と照合を自動化することもできます。
localize.tagline: スピードとスケールを追求した請求書作成

localize.description: Stripe Invoicing 是一个全球性的发票平台，旨在为您节省时间并使您更快得到付款。在几分钟内创建并发送由Stripe托管的发票--不需要任何代码。或者，使用发票 API 来自动收集和核对付款。
localize.tagline: 为速度和规模而建立的发票开具

localize.description: Stripe Invoicing 是一個全球性的發票平臺，旨在爲您節省時間並使您更快得到付款。在幾分鐘內創建併發送由Stripe託管的發票--不需要任何代碼。或者，使用發票 API 來自動收集和核對付款。
localize.tagline: 爲速度和規模而建立的發票開具

previous.excerpt: After Audio Hijack, Loopback was the second audio app I bought from Rogue Amoeba and I've used it almost constantly since. The beautiful thing about Loopback is that it just works - you set it, and then you can forget about it.
previous.title: Loopback - Cable free audio routing for Mac
